comments.body: How about moving the rule catalog.ParquetConversions and catalog.OrcConversions at the beginning of the batch `postHocResolutionRules `?

         catalog.OrcConversions ::

comments.body: do they need to? Eventually they will be optimizer rules.

comments.body:
These two rules need `MetastoreRelation`. Ideally, they should be after the rule `FindHiveSerdeTable`. 

I am fine to keep it if we plan to move it into optimizer rules.
